infocus.blurb: Supporting graduate students and scientists seeking to accelerate their fundamental understanding of emerging topics and techniques from across the sciences.

symposium.blurb: High-quality, peer-reviewed ebooks containing essential research overviews by the expert scientists spanning all disciplines and applications.

reagents.blurb: Specifications and Procedures for Reagents and Standard-Grade Reference Materials.

styleguide.blurb: Instruction and advice for students, researchers, educators, and librarians on all topics of scholarly communication.
